eventParts.text: Oh, a group of birds. I wonder what they’re doing all the way out here?
Hello there, friends! Can we help you?
What’s this, a lonely bird actually hanging out with others?
Oh come on, everybirdy knows lonely birds don’t have any friends!
You’re not actually trying to be friendly, are you? You should go back to your books and scrolls! It’s not like you’re doing anything to actually help people out.
Yeah, even neutral birds help out with building and farming stuff. What do lonely birds do, anyway?

eventConsequence.selectionText: Hey, don’t be mean! Sophie is a great bird and there’s nothing wrong with being lonely! She can hang out with us even if that’s what she wants to be like.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Thank you, I really appreciate that.

Sophie gains +2 social!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Lonely birds do help out! Who do you think writes all those books? Without lonely birds no one would know how to do anything because they write all the books that friendly and confident and all other birds use!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Thanks! I do write books like those, and I like doing it. 

Sophie gains +2 solitude!
